column4: I've got a question. I've changed the system language from system->administration->support on a 8.10 installation but i still get everything in the old language. Even after creating a new user. The locales have changed in /etc/environment but nothing happened.Any help appreciated
you have to change your desired language on the gdm (where you type your login and pass)
logout of your current session and try searching for it on the screen where you type your login
